text: Wint Smith (October 7, 1892 â€“ April 27, 1976) was an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative from Kansas from 1947 to 1961. Smith voted against the Civil Rights Acts of 1957 and 1960. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Kansas Republicans Category:United States representatives from Kansas
